seed_pair.known: It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.
seed_pair.target: 当你和他们一起做困难的事情时这不是问题。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I thought that was a good idea.
I believe that your idea was very good.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我相信你的主意非常好。

recent_seed_pairs.known: This work is changing the shape of my brain.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 这个工作正在改变我大脑的形状。

recent_seed_pairs.known: That isn't why I wanted to see you.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 那不是为什么我想见你。

recent_seed_pairs.known: You're like someone I used to know.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 你像我以前认识的某个人。

recent_seed_pairs.known: I'm so happy that you're doing so well.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 我很高兴你做得这么好。

recent_seed_pairs.known: That was a surprise, because he's my friend.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 那是个惊喜，因为他是我的朋友。

recent_seed_pairs.known: There are too many ideas going around in my head.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 有太多想法在我的脑海里转。

recent_seed_pairs.known: That's less exciting than what she was saying.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 那比她正在说的不那么令人兴奋。

recent_seed_pairs.known: You get to know someone very well when you work together.
recent_seed_pairs.target: 当你们一起工作的时候你会非常了解一个人。

recent_new_legos.target: 当你们一起工作的时候
